jcr:content.jcr:title: Audience segmentation
jcr:content.browserTitle: Customer and audience segmentation | Adobe Audience Manager
jcr:content.metaDescription: Rules-based audience segmentation lets you build audience segments from your site visitors and find new customers using the traits of your best customers.
jcr:content.tagsKeywords: customer segmentation, audience segmentation, audience segments

promo.productIntroText: See how Adobe Campaign can help your business.

free.productIntroText: See how Adobe Campaign can help your business.

paid.productIntroText: See how Adobe Campaign can help your business.

mmarquee.text: Build audience profiles that you can use anywhere.

text_f06d.text: Zero in on big opportunities.

text_ca45.text: It’s your most loyal fans who keep your business moving. But if you can’t separate them from countless other site visitors, offering them the personal attention they deserve is impossible. Having a DMP with rules-based audience segmentation lets you identify your most valuable customers, so you can deliver relevant experiences to those who matter most.

text_be12.text: Build high-value segments using online and offline data.

text_62e4.text: Find new users whose behavior matches your best customers.

text_83ea.text: Target people across touchpoints and devices.

text_db86.text: Create connected user experiences with Experience Cloud integrations.

text_4c5b.text: Machine learning builds on what you already know.

text_e478.text: Audience Manager's lookalike modeling powered by Adobe Sensei finds similar audiences based on algorithmic segmentation, enabling marketers to find new high-value audiences.

text_d0e7.text: Audience Manager integrates seamlessly with other Experience Cloud solutions. So Adobe Analytics, Target, Media Optimizer, and Campaign customers can easily import audiences for a complete end-to-end user experience.

text_bdf2.text: Integration with Analytics is our customers’ most utilized feature.

text_ff77.text: Discover new potential customers from within Audience Manager. Having a data management platform with native algorithmic segmentation means you won’t have to lean on an external source for lookalike modeling.

text_aef8.text: Recognize your customers in every context.

text_1f7c.text: Merge user identities across devices, touchpoints, and authentication states. Then recognize your customers every time they engage.

text_187a.text: Customer experiences matter. Which means your DMP matters.

text_7698.text: See why we are a Leader in The Forrester Wave™: Data Management Platforms, Q2 2017.

text_150b.text: Do more with your marketing.

text_c558.text: Define your audience ›

text_6aff.text: Grow audiences with customer intelligence ›

text_9fe.text: Efficiently reach your target audience ›
